name: Pumpkin White Hot Chocolate
description: With milk, cream, pumpkin puree, sugar and pumpkin pie spice, complete your Pumpkin White Hot Chocolate and enjoy
steps:
1) In a saucepan, add the milk, cream, pumpkin puree, sugar and pumpkin pie spice, simmer on low for about 5 minutes.

2) Add the chocolate chips and vanilla, whisk until the chocolate has melted and serve!
